name: oh h.anna.h
description: oh h.anna.h is a story about two women: Hannah, an world-champion player in Shotgun Overdrive, a popular first-person shooter in the esports circuit, and Anna, a military veteran who is forced to retire early due to an injury. As Anna learns the ropes of Shotgun Overdrive to pass the time, Hanna struggles to find meaning in her life now that her career is over.
